name: Sketch - Animate using Clutter + Cairo
short_description:
The Clutter-toolkit already offers some really nice concepts and API's for animating 2d-Canvas-objects in a 3d-space.

Sketch aims to go even a step further, allowing to animate the drawing process of 2d-Canvases in exactly the same way.
Sketch provides a set of Operation-classes, which can easily be stacked on top of each other, making it easy to build up complex animations. It is tightly integrated with the Clutter-way of doing things, allowing you to implicitly animate the way things are drawn just by changing some properties on some of your Operation-objects.

Sketch is written in Vala.
Right now it is nothing more than a proof-of-concept.
summary: Animate cairo's drawing operations in a Clutter-way
